readable.title: 2559503010_84f20b3bc9
readable.content: a man stands outside a bank selling watermelons . A man with a red Shriner hat is looking at watermelons in front of a bank . Dark colored Mercury car parked in front of PNC Bank . The man is looking at watermelons for sale outside of a bank . There is a man , wearing a funny hat , standing in front of a bank .
